Package paoo.game.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
paoo.game.entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Grandpa, MON_Boss, MON_Goblin, ObjCarrot, ObjCave, ObjChest, ObjCup, ObjDiamond, ObjHeart, ObjPendant, ObjPickaxe, ObjPortal, ObjSword, Player, Wizard
public class Entity extends Object
Base class for all game entities including players, NPCs, monsters, and items. Provides common functionality for movement, animation, collision detection, and rendering.

    • setAction

      public void setAction()
      Defines the AI behavior for this entity. Override this method in subclasses to implement specific behaviors.

    • checkAttackOrNot

      public void checkAttackOrNot(int rate, int straight, int horizontal)
      Checks if the entity should initiate an attack based on player proximity and direction.
      Parameters:
      rate - the random rate for attack initiation (1 in rate chance)
      straight - the maximum distance in the facing direction
      horizontal - the maximum distance perpendicular to facing direction

    • moveTowardPlayer

      public void moveTowardPlayer(int interval)
      Makes the entity move toward the player at specified intervals.
      Parameters:
      interval - the number of frames between direction changes

    • getTileDistance

      public double getTileDistance(Entity entity)
      Calculates the distance between this entity and another entity in tiles.
      Parameters:
      entity - the target entity
      Returns:
      the distance in tiles as a double

    • getCenterX

      public int getCenterX()
      Gets the center X coordinate of this entity.
      Returns:
      the center X coordinate in world space

    • getCenterY

      public int getCenterY()
      Gets the center Y coordinate of this entity.
      Returns:
      the center Y coordinate in world space

    • getXDistance

      public int getXDistance(Entity entity)
      Calculates the horizontal distance between this entity and another entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the target entity
      Returns:
      the absolute horizontal distance in pixels

    • getYDistance

      public int getYDistance(Entity entity)
      Calculates the vertical distance between this entity and another entity.
      Parameters:
      entity - the target entity
      Returns:
      the absolute vertical distance in pixels

    • attacking

      public void attacking()
      Handles the attack animation and collision detection. Updates sprite frames and performs attack collision checks.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the entity's state including movement, animation, and collision detection. Called once per frame during the game loop.

    • getScreenX

      public int getScreenX()
      Calculates the screen X coordinate for rendering based on camera position.
      Returns:
      the screen X coordinate

    • getScreenY

      public int getScreenY()
      Calculates the screen Y coordinate for rendering based on camera position.
      Returns:
      the screen Y coordinate

    • inCamera

      public boolean inCamera()
      Checks if this entity is within the camera view bounds.
      Returns:
      true if the entity should be rendered, false otherwise

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphics2D)
      Renders the entity to the screen with appropriate sprite and effects.
      Parameters:
      graphics2D - the Graphics2D context for rendering

    • speak

      public void speak()
      Handles NPC dialogue interaction. Advances through dialogue array and faces the player.

    • interact

      public void interact()
      Handles entity interaction behavior. Override this method in subclasses for specific interaction logic.

    • getBufferedImage

      protected BufferedImage getBufferedImage(int frame, BufferedImage frame1, BufferedImage frame2, BufferedImage frame3, BufferedImage frame4)
      Returns the appropriate sprite frame based on the animation frame number.
      Parameters:
      frame - the current frame number (1-4)
      frame1 - the first animation frame
      frame2 - the second animation frame
      frame3 - the third animation frame
      frame4 - the fourth animation frame
      Returns:
      the appropriate BufferedImage for the current frame

    • setup

      public BufferedImage setup(String imagePath)
      Loads and scales an image from the resources' folder.
      Parameters:
      imagePath - the path to the image file (without .png extension)
      Returns:
      the loaded and scaled BufferedImage, or null if loading failed
